channel.title: #474 - Pk Predatory
channel.description:
Well, I haven't done much yet. Just fixed some bugs and added combat.
[b]Combat System:[/b] - What I have done yet for combat.
-Added the packet. (196) -Added Combat sideicon -> Thanks to Songoty. -Added fight types for weapons. Default is unarmed. -Animations -Hitting delays. -HP Decreases on NPC (Depends on your hit) -If NPC's HP reaches 0 NPC dies (gotta fix dead animation) -If NPC's HP reaches 0 It resets your attack. -Auto Attacking -No max hit yets + no hit on levels depending & strenght bonuses. You get the idea. -NPC Attacks back but no hits yet.
[b]Misc Updates:[/b] -Fixed stand, run, walk anims. Thanks to Kyye for leeching my woodcutting base & the stand,walk,run anims. -Added equipment interface. No bonuses yet & No interface yet to see what you have equiped so you can unequip, You know what im saying. -Fixed some bugs. -Rewrote Autospawn. -Added leveling.
[b]!FAQ![/b]
[b]Q1:[/b] Will you show some pictures/video's about your progress? [i]Yes, I will. I can't post pictures, Laptop won't let me take screenshots. But I will make videos so much as I can.[/i]
[b]Q2:[/b] Will you host this server if its close to beta? [i]Hell yea.[/i]
I grab my chain maybe thats the reason why I may fuck your bitch.
[b]Credits:[/b] Cellkyborg for creating 474. Hidendra for helping me with MySQL. Me for editing the 474.
~Encouragin

item.title: #474 - Pk Predatory
item.dc:creator: @Encouragin Encouragin
item.description:
@Encouragin wrote:

Well, I haven’t done much yet. Just fixed some bugs and added combat.

Combat System: - What I have done yet for combat.

-Added the packet. (196)
-Added Combat sideicon -> Thanks to Songoty.
-Added fight types for weapons. Default is unarmed.
-Animations
-Hitting delays.
-HP Decreases on NPC (Depends on your hit)
-If NPC’s HP reaches 0 NPC dies (gotta fix dead animation)
-If NPC’s HP reaches 0 It resets your attack.
-Auto Attacking
-No max hit yets + no hit on levels depending & strenght bonuses. You get the idea.
-NPC Attacks back but no hits yet.

Misc Updates:
-Fixed stand, run, walk anims. Thanks to Kyye for leeching my woodcutting base & the stand,walk,run anims.
-Added equipment interface. No bonuses yet & No interface yet to see what you have equiped so you can unequip, You know what im saying.
-Fixed some bugs.
-Rewrote Autospawn.
-Added leveling.

!FAQ!

Q1: Will you show some pictures/video’s about your progress?
Yes, I will. I can’t post pictures, Laptop won’t let me take screenshots. But I will make videos so much as I can.

Q2: Will you host this server if its close to beta?
Hell yea.

I grab my chain maybe thats the reason why I may fuck your bitch.

Credits:
Cellkyborg for creating 474.
Hidendra for helping me with MySQL.
Me for editing the 474.

~Encouragin

Read full topic
